org.cs309.backend.Message

Class MessageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cs309.backend.Message.MessageController

  • public class MessageController
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller for messages operations. Accessible via /messages/*

    • Method Detail

      • getRecipientMessages

        public java.lang.String getRecipientMessages(java.lang.Long recipientId)
        Gets the inbox for a particular user. Accessible via /messages/inbox/*id*
        Parameters:
        recipientId - The id of the recipient for which to obtain the mailbox
        Returns:
        a JSON representation of the user's inbox. The key is the message id and the value is a JSON object consisting of the Message's sender id, recipient id, and time.

      • getAllInboxMessages

        public java.util.List<Message> getAllInboxMessages(java.lang.Long recipientId)
        Gets all inbox messages for a particular user via the MessageRepository class.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the nation for whom one wants to get all the messages.
        Returns:
        A List of messages that make up the nation's inbox

      • getAll

        public java.lang.String getAll()
        Gets all messages in the database. Used for debugging purposes, will be deleted in release. Accessiblt via /messages/all
        Returns:
        a JSON representation of all messages in the database.

      • getAllMessages

        public java.util.List<Message> getAllMessages()
        Gets all messages in the database via the MessageRepository class.
        Returns:
        A List of all the messages in a repository

      • getBySenderid

        public java.lang.String getBySenderid(java.lang.Long id)
        Gets a user's sent messages. Accessible via /messages/sent/*id*
        Parameters:
        id - The user for whom to get sent messages
        Returns:
        A JSON representation of the user's sent messages

      • getAllSentMessages

        public java.util.List<Message> getAllSentMessages(java.lang.Long id)
        Gets all sent messages from the database via the MessageRepository.
        Parameters:
        The - id of the user for whom to get the sent messages
        Returns:
        A List of all sent messages by the user

      • submitMessage

        public java.lang.String submitMessage(java.lang.String senderId,
                                      java.lang.String recipientName,
                                      java.lang.String body)
        Submits a new message to a user. Must be a POST request sent to /messages/submit
        Parameters:
        senderId - The ID for the sender of the message
        recipientName - The name of the recipient of the message
        body - The body of the message
